header: 英语语法中阶练习题（一）

questions.question: I see Tom ______ in the park.
questions.cn: 我看到汤姆正在公园里跑。
questions.explanation: 句子中使用了动词“see”，表示看到正在发生的事情，因此动词“run”也应该是正在进行时态的“is running”。

questions.question: They talked and ______ on the way home.
questions.cn: 他们在回家的路上说说笑笑。
questions.explanation: 根据句子中的动词“talked”，可以确定句子发生在过去。因此，动词“laugh”也应该是过去时态的“laughed”。

questions.question: We cannot but ______ at him.
questions.cn: 我们不得不笑他。
questions.explanation: 句子中的“cannot but”表示“不得不”，因此动词“laugh”也应该是强制性的语气。而“laughing”表示正在进行的行为，不符合句子意思；“to laugh”表示将来的行为，不符合句子意思；“laughed”表示过去的行为，也不能表示强制性的语气。因此，选项 A 是唯一正确的答案。

questions.question: He is ______ do the work.
questions.cn: 他年纪太大不能做这项工作。
questions.explanation: 句子中的“too old”表示“太老了”，因此动词“to do”也应该表示不能做的意思。而“enough old to”表示“足够老了可以做的”，不符合句子意思；“to old too”是错误的搭配；“very old to”表示“非常老了可以做的”，也不符合句子意思。因此，选项 D 是唯一正确的答案。

questions.question: He is a teacher, and his brother is ______.
questions.cn: 他是位教师,他的兄弟也是。

questions.question: He will go to the store and ______ a present.
questions.cn: 他要去商店买个礼物。

questions.question: He is ______ of all the students in school.
questions.cn: 他是全校学生中最高的。

questions.question: He is the man ______ came yesterday.
questions.cn: 他是昨天来的那位男人。

questions.question: What do you mean ______ that?
questions.cn: 你那样说是什么意思?

questions.question: There are ______ farmers working on the farm.
questions.cn: 几百个农民正在农场劳动。

questions.question: Can you tell John ______ his brother?
questions.cn: 你能区别约翰和他的弟弟吗?

questions.question: We will go together if you ______ earlier.
questions.cn: 如果你来的早些,我们就一起去。

questions.question: Remember ______ there by yourself.
questions.cn: 记住不要自己去那里。

questions.question: It takes me twenty minutes ______ there.
questions.cn: 我到那里要用二十分钟。

questions.question: She enjoys staying at home and ______ to some music.
questions.cn: 她喜欢待在家里听些音乐。

questions.question: I usually ______ after dinner.
questions.cn: 晚餐后我通常要散步。

questions.question: I only have a ______ with me.
questions.cn: 我只随身带了一点行李。

questions.question: I am the man ______ came yesterday.
questions.cn: 我就是昨天来的那个人。

questions.question: The sun ______ in the east.
questions.cn: 太阳从东方升起。

questions.question: We had meetings once ______ a while.
questions.cn: 我们有时开会。

questions.question: He ______ to the movies last night.
questions.cn: 他昨天晚上确实去看电影了。

questions.question: You can have those students ______ you.
questions.cn: 你可以让那些学生帮你。

questions.question: He ______ in a poor family.
questions.cn: 他出生于一个穷苦家庭。

questions.question: It is she ______ came yesterday.
questions.cn: 昨天来的是她。

questions.question: Flowers are ______ on the front of the houses.
questions.cn: 房屋的前面挂着许多花。

questions.question: Of all the students, one-third ______ going to the zoo.
questions.cn: 所有的学生中,三分之一的人去动物园。

questions.question: The whole class ______ outside.
questions.cn: 全班的人正在外面玩耍。

questions.question: He ______ there for a long time.
questions.cn: 他已在那里站了很长时间。

questions.question: There ______ in the room.
questions.cn: 房间里没有什么家具。

questions.question: He began teaching in his early ______.

questions.question: These three girls are ______.
questions.cn: 这三个女孩岁数一样大。

questions.question: You'll regret ______ this to me someday.
questions.cn: 有一天你会后悔对我做这种事。

questions.question: There is ______ about him.

questions.question: What time ______ he usually get up every morning?

questions.cn: 我服过一些药,但是我仍然觉得不舒服。

questions.question: Jim is ______ than any other student in our class.
questions.cn: 吉姆是我们班上个子最高的学生。

questions.question: Each student in our class ______ a new book.
questions.cn: 我们班上每位学生都有一本新书。

questions.question: They will buy a new apartment near ______ house.
questions.cn: 他们将要在林家的房子附近买一间新的公寓。

questions.question: I saw the boy ______ Frisbee in the park.
questions.cn: 我在公园看过那个男孩玩飞盘。

questions.question: She bought many things, ______ they were cheaper.
questions.cn: 她买了许多东西,因为它们更便宜。

questions.question: He bought a new book, and so ______ I.
questions.cn: 他买了一本新书,我也买了。

questions.question: Sue has to study hard, and so ______ I.
questions.cn: 苏必须用功学习,我也是。

questions.question: I don't know ______.

questions.question: She's only been in the United States a few ______.
questions.cn: 她只在美国待了几天。

questions.question: You can take ______ you like.
questions.cn: 你可以拿你想要的。

questions.question: Neither Sara nor I ______ wrong.
questions.cn: 莎拉和我都没有错。

questions.question: I don't think my English is ______.

questions.question: Kevin spent two hours ______ English yesterday.
questions.cn: 凯文昨天用了两个小时学英文。

questions.question: No one knows ______.
questions.cn: 没有人知道他怎么了。
options: A. what is wrong with him
B. how often is he late

header: 英语语法中阶练习题（二）

questions.question: Study as ______ as you did last term.

questions.question: The old man ______ for three years.

questions.question: The windows need ______.

questions.question: ______ everyone likes to watch TV.
questions.cn: 不是每一个人都喜欢看电视。

questions.question: The price of the machine is ______.

questions.question: This book is not interesting, and that book is not, ______.

questions.question: He avoided ______ his opinion on the plan.

questions.question: Your coat will lose its color ______.

options: A. after it will be washed

questions.question: This is the tallest building ______.
questions.cn: 这是我所见过的最高的建筑。
options: B. which I have ever seen
C. what I have ever seen

header: 英语语法中阶练习题（三）

questions.question: Is this dictionary the one ______?

questions.question: I like playing the piano and so does ______.
questions.cn: 我喜欢弹钢琴,他也喜欢。

header: 英语语法中阶练习题（四）

questions.cn: 我花了十元买这个杯子。

questions.cn: 海伦是她班上最漂亮的学生。

header: 英语语法中阶练习题（五）

questions.question: Jim is ______ than all the other students in our class.

questions.cn: 这个小男孩奇怪的行为引起了我的好奇。

questions.question: The books on the desk are mine, not ______.
questions.cn: 课桌上的书是我的,不是他的。

questions.cn: 你在什么样的餐馆里用餐?

questions.cn: 那个男孩正坐在公园的长凳上。

questions.question: I want my parents to ______ me some day.
questions.cn: 我想让父母将来有一天为我感到骄傲。

questions.question: English is my favorite ______ in school.
questions.cn: 在学校英文是我最喜欢的科目。

questions.question: ______ did you stay in New York?

questions.cn: 所有的学生都要参加考试。

questions.question: Smoking does ______ to your health.
questions.cn: 吸烟对你的健康有害。

questions.question: These cars are more expensive than those ______.
questions.cn: 这些车比那些车贵。

questions.cn: 她在乡间迷路了。

questions.question: There are many kinds of ______ in the lake.
questions.cn: 这湖里有很多种鱼。

questions.question: She didn't go, and ______.
questions.cn: 她没有去,我也没去。

questions.question: I learn French, and so ______ Mary.
questions.cn: 我学习法语,玛丽也一样。

questions.question: I ______ my old friend yesterday.
questions.cn: 昨天我拜访了我的老朋友。

questions.cn: 你的建议听起来还可以。

questions.cn: 女孩子们正在看墙上的一幅画。

header: 英语语法中阶练习题（六）

questions.question: ______ will you have dinner?

questions.cn: 他必须付清债务。

questions.question: I like to ______ classical music.
questions.cn: 我喜欢听古典音乐。

questions.question: Be careful, ______ you'll fall into the river.
questions.cn: 当心,否则你就会掉进河里去了。

questions.question: We can neither see ______ touch air.
questions.cn: 我们既看不见也摸不着空气。

questions.question: It was ______ a long journey that we felt tired.
questions.cn: 旅途太远,我们感到很累。

questions.question: It looks ______ it was going to snow.
questions.cn: 看起来天似乎要下雪。

questions.cn: 我想你可以在这里找到工作。

questions.cn: 我来这里办事,而不是娱乐。

questions.cn: 他有一辆从英国进口的汽车。

questions.cn: 会议将持续一整天。

questions.question: I have been to Beijing ______.

questions.cn: 我有一台与你相同的打字机。

questions.cn: 那个手提包几乎和我的一样。

header: 英语语法中阶练习题（七）

questions.cn: 你穿上新衣服看起来真好看!

options: A. a friend of my father
B. a friend of my father's

header: 英语语法中阶练习题（八）

questions.question: There is a post office ______ of the street.

questions.cn: 因缺少资金,房子无法完工。

options: B. give me a big hand
C. give me a glad hand
D. give me a free hand

header: 英语语法中阶练习题（九）

questions.question: He is hard to ______.
